description:
Nishikata has mastered tandem riding with Takagi-san, so why does he feel a bit melancholy?
On his way to school, Nishikata is psyched about the typhoon, but he runs into Takagi-san at the worst timing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le typhon / La course à pied / Les chatouilles / Regrets
台風 / マラソン / わき腹 / 未練
